author: Alexandra DeSanctis
title: Notre Dame Becomes a Bit Less Catholic
text:
The University of Notre Dame caved in. It will partly obey the ObamaCare mandate requiring employer health-care plans to cover the cost of contraceptives and abortifacient drugs. Rejecting the Trump administration’s religious exemption, Notre Dame announced last month that it will provide “simple contraceptives” to students and employees through its insurance program.
Notre Dame’s president, the Rev. John Jenkins, deserves praise for discontinuing coverage of abortifacients. Yet he justified the birth-control decision by saying,...
